name: Techno Chess
description:
Defeaf the Chess King in this fast-paced bullet hell game in which you get stronger with every health point lost.

How to Play : Controls

WASD - Moving your character
Left Mouse Button - Shooting Space - Dash
Tab - Deal Damage to yourself

Objective of the Game :
To win you have to defeat the Chess Boss. But he won’t go down so easily, changing in every level and spawning new waves.
Your Character:
Your Character has 5 hp points, but with every lost point he becomes stronger.

Creators:

SekuS

Burzej
